metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28356 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel before 5.17.1, a refcount leak bug was found in net/llc/af_llc.c. 赵子轩 discovered that the 802.2 LLC type 2 driver in the Linux kernel did not properly perform reference counting in some error conditions. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service.

notes.Note: cascardo> LLC sockets are not supported on network namespaces and require CAP_NET_RAW
